data.name: PackageIdArgumentName
data.value: PACKAGE_ID

data.name: PackageIdArgumentDescription
data.value: The NuGet Package Id of the tool to update.

data.name: SpecifyExactlyOnePackageId
data.value: Specify one tool Package Id to update.

data.name: AddSourceOptionDescription
data.value: Add an additional NuGet package source to use during the update.

data.name: AddSourceOptionName
data.value: SOURCE

data.name: CommandDescription
data.value: Update a global tool.

data.name: ConfigFileOptionName
data.value: FILE

data.name: ConfigFileOptionDescription
data.value: The NuGet configuration file to use.

data.name: FrameworkOptionName
data.value: FRAMEWORK

data.name: FrameworkOptionDescription
data.value: The target framework to update the tool for.

data.name: NuGetConfigurationFileDoesNotExist
data.value: NuGet configuration file '{0}' does not exist.

data.name: UpdateSucceeded
data.value: Tool '{0}' was successfully updated from version '{1}' to version '{2}'.

data.name: GlobalOptionDescription
data.value: Update the tool in the current user's tools directory.

data.name: UpdateFullCommandNameLocalized
data.value: .NET update Command

data.name: UpdateToolCommandNeedGlobalOrToolPath
data.value: Specify either the global option (--global) or the tool path option (--tool-path).

data.name: UpdateToolCommandInvalidGlobalAndToolPath
data.value: (--global) conflicts with the tool path option (--tool-path). Specify only one of the options.

data.name: ToolPathOptionName
data.value: PATH

data.name: ToolPathOptionDescription
data.value: The directory containing the tool to update.

data.name: ToolHasMultipleVersionsInstalled
data.value: Tool '{0}' has multiple versions installed and cannot be updated.

data.name: ToolNotInstalled
data.value:
A tool with the package Id '{0}' could not be found.
Tools are updated using their package Id which may be different from the tool name you use when calling the tool. You can find the tool names and the corresponding package Ids for installed tools using the command 'dotnet tool list'.

data.name: UpdateSucceededVersionNoChange
data.value: Tool '{0}' was reinstalled with the latest stable version (version '{1}').

data.name: UpdateToolFailed
data.value: Tool '{0}' failed to update due to the following:

data.name: VersionOptionName
data.value: VERSION

data.name: VersionOptionDescription
data.value: The version range of the tool package to update to.

data.name: InvalidNuGetVersionRange
data.value: Specified version '{0}' is not a valid NuGet version range.

data.name: UpdateToLowerVersion
data.value: The requested version {0} is lower than existing version {1}.

data.name: UpdateToolCommandInvalidGlobalAndLocalAndToolPath
data.value: The local option (--local), the global option (--global), and the tool path option (--tool-path) cannot be used together. Specify only one of the options: {0}.

data.name: LocalOptionDescription
data.value: Update the tool and the local tool manifest.

data.name: ManifestPathOptionDescription
data.value: Path to the manifest file.

data.name: ManifestPathOptionName
data.value: PATH

data.name: UpdateLocalToolSucceeded
data.value: Tool '{0}' was successfully updated from version '{1}' to version '{2}' (manifest file {3}).

data.name: UpdateLocaToolToLowerVersion
data.value: The requested version {0} is lower than existing version {1} (manifest file {2}).

data.name: UpdateLocaToolSucceededVersionNoChange
data.value: Tool '{0}' is up to date (version '{1}' manifest file {2}) .
